articles.title: Golden Globes crisis deepens as former president expelled and advisers resign - The Guardian
articles.description: Hollywood Foreign Press Association expels Philip Berk after he shared article calling Black Lives Matter a ‘racist hate group’
articles.content: The crisis-plagued Hollywood Foreign Press Association (HFPA), the body that organises the Golden Globes, has expelled Philip Berk, its former president who sparked widespread outrage by sharing an a… [+2064 chars]
